name: Gmail: hide labels
description:
To hide some of your gmail labels (for example, abc), re-name them like "x_abc", which will be hidden by this style file. Inspired by ``gmail label hider'' user script and partially copied from this post: 

http://groups.google.com/group/Gmail-ABCs/browse_thread/thread/1f8fcc96f1f383dc/dba0029b721ccc6a%23dba0029b721ccc6a
